entry.content:
#include

#include

#include

#include
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
const int MAX=1e6+7;
int main(){
map<string,char>mp;
mp[“0000”]=’0’;
mp[“0001”]=’1’;
mp[“0010”]=’2’;
mp[“0011”]=’3’;
mp[“0100”]=’4’;
mp[“0101”]=’5’;
mp[“0110”]=’6’;
mp[“0111”]=’7’;
mp[“1000”]=’8’;
mp[“1001”]=’9’;
mp[“1010”]=’a’;
mp[“1011”]=’b’;
mp[“1100”]=’c’;
mp[“1101”]=’d’;
mp[“1110”]=’e’;
mp[“1111”]=’f’;
vectorarr;
int n;
cin>>n;
for(int ii=0;ii<n;ii++){
string a;
cin>>a;
for(ll i;a.size()>4;){
i=a.size()-4;
string aa=”0000”;
for(ll ii=0;ii<4;ii++){
aa[ii]=a[i];
i++;
}
a.erase(a.end()-4,a.end());
arr.push_back(mp[aa]);
}
if(a.size()==4){
arr.push_back(mp[a]);
}
else if(a.size()==3){
a.insert(a.begin(),’0’);
arr.push_back(mp[a]);
}
else if(a.size()==2){
a.insert(a.begin(),’0’);
a.insert(a.begin(),’0’);
arr.push_back(mp[a]);
}
else if(a.size()==1){
a.insert(a.begin(),’0’);
a.insert(a.begin(),’0’);
a.insert(a.begin(),’0’);
arr.push_back(mp[a]);
}
for(ll i=arr.size()-1;i>=0;i–){
cout<<arr[i];
}
if(ii<n){
cout<<endl;
arr.clear();
}
}
return 0;

}
